name: christopher metcalf
text: This location has been extremely hit or miss. Sometimes great service etc, other times missing food and employees fighting amongst themselves when asked about it (this was addressed later). Our last experience our pizzas were upside-down so...

name: Zenitha Etinoff
text: Let me start by saying, I love Pizza Hut pizza but this location was a let down. I order a large extra cheese pizza with garlic buttery crust. The pizza was not good, there was no extra cheese and I could not taste the garlic buttery crust. I was very disappointed with this order.

name: charles cignatta

text: My pizza was missing the crust flavor I requested. I got plain crust but my order was for the hut favorite crust. So my pizza was bland.

text:
Slowest service possible.

text: The young lady there what's the most helpless person and the nicest person I have ever met and customer service she deserves a raise she deserves a promotion I think she is the manager she deserves to be regional manager not District ‚Ä¶More

name: P Bartley
text: It was busy but there was an intern working the front if the house and he was very engaging, informative and even opened the pizza boxes so customers could see the food. Order came up quickly and the entire team was focused and working hard. Definitely will be back... Food was well and correctly prepared.

name: Megan Clark
text: I had to wait kind of a long time despite ordering online ahead of time and being the only customer in the store. Obviously I can't be certain how many delivery orders were being made but I do know my food sat in the warmer for about 10 mins before it was given to me. Regardless, the pizza was great as usual!

name: Sydney Bloom
text: The pizza was terrible. It wasn‚Äôt cut, it was hard, thin, and barely had any cheese or sauce. The only good part was the crust. The lady at the cash register was very sweet, but the food itself was awful.

name: josh farley
text: Order pizza at 7:02 arrived a 7:27. Girl (Jamie) took credit card repeated our name. Then disappeared. Ten minutes later, an order that looked like our order went into the warmer by the girl that repeated our name. 12 minutes later I had to ‚Ä¶More

name: K. Steph
text:
Delivery staff and store staff all seem nice.

Order from them online quite often. ‚Ä¶More

name: Laurel Allender
text: Good price. Really tasty crust.

name: Sarah Fischer
text: Only giving 2 stars for fast delivery and courteous driver.  Buffalo wings were not really buffalo flavored and dough was undercooked...very chewy and almost raw.  That would explain the fast delivery.  Wiyjld have been happy to have it 5 minutes later if it were actually thoroughly cooked.

name: Crystalina Ann
text: Ordered pizza for my hubby's bday. When I arrived I was immediately greeted by 2 people who work there.  They gave me plates, napkins and cups.. very pleasant service.  I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants speedy friendly service!

name: Kevin Metcalfe
text: Pizza was dry and toppings were light.

name: Adrian S.
text: Everything is as it should be here. Like the mad Titan Thanos says, "Perfectly balanced, as all things should be."

name: Kristy Hyatt

text: Ordered food for delivery last night and spoke to a woman by the name of Jess. It was a very unpleasant experience as she was extremely rude. Once our conversation was done I asked her name as I planned to write a review and she simply hung up on me. Its a real shame you have these type of people working for you!

text: We ordered our pizza at approximately 6:21 p.m. Although they were of an unprecedented length, we only received about 21.5 freezing fries. If you are a member of a large family, we recommend ordering seven boxes of fries.
